synopsis.text: Ariadust Academy's Tori and his allies seize the chance presented by the Mikawa Conflict to liberate Horizon from the clutches of the Testament Union. As their floating city, Musashi, makes haste towards the Floating Island England, Tres Espa√±a readies its naval forces for a showdown with the British Islanders. Amidst the unfolding drama, the enigmatic Armor of Deadly Sins comes into play, and the historical events chronicled in the Testament continue to be reenacted. As Tori embarks on a new battle in the realm of the Fairy Queen, the search for Horizon's emotions reaches a crescendo in the action-packed second season of Horizon in the Middle of Nowhere. With the students of Ariadust Academy utilizing their unique abilities to forge alliances and protect the revived heir to the Mikawa throne, they must navigate a complex web of global superpowers now turned adversaries.
